name: T - Nelson Mia
_source: speak;Nelson; So we meet again, lady-
speak;Nelson; WHOA watch the axe!{w} You could've hit me!
speak;Mia; That's the idea, you money grubbing thief!{w} IT TOOK ME THREE MONTHS TO GAIN THEIR TRUST and YOU ruined my chances to get any pay!!!
speak;Nelson; Well, sorry for being more smarter.{w} Since they don't have the money to pay you,{w} can you stop trying to split my head open like a watermelon?{w} You won't even get money for it!
speak;Mia; Maybe I should crack your skull open anyway and see how smart that brain looks for myself.
speak;Nelson; Hmm...words clearly aren't her language.{w} Alright, I got an idea.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Nelson; Well, seeing as how I'm the one with the coin purse,{w} how about I pay you to fight them with us?{w} You get paid, and I stay alive.
speak;Mia; Fine, but you pay me up front.{w} You're nto going to pull one over on me, but I don't care who hires me.
speak;Mia; Would you rather I kill you and take the gold out of your cold, dead hands?{w} Actually, I like the sound of that{tgm}...
speak;Nelson; No, no, that's fine{tgm}...{tgm} Welcome aboard, Miss{tgm}...?
speak;Mia; Mia. My name is Mia.
speak;Nelson; The name's Nelson!{w} Now, let's fight those Umbra and cut down some demons!
